#
# Node.js required shared libraries
#

# musl

file  /lib/libc.so                $TOOLS/$TARGET/lib/libc.so 0555 0 0
slink /lib/ld-musl-$CPU_PORT.so.1 libc.so                    0555 0 0

# gcc

file /lib/libgcc_s.so.1       $TOOLS/$TARGET/lib/libgcc_s.so.1       0444 0 0
file /lib/libstdc++.so.6.0.21 $TOOLS/$TARGET/lib/libstdc++.so.6.0.21 0444 0 0

slink /lib/libstdc++.so.6 libstdc++.so.6.0.21 0444 0 0


#
# Node.js binary
#

file /bin/node $OBJECTS/node 0555 0 0
